name: Dodge Bullet
description:
Welcome to Dodge Bullet!

In this game, you have to dodge bullets in a square box while releasing the mouse on bullets to make them explode and blow up other bullets and enemies.Here are the controls:

  • Left mouse button release = blow up a bullet.
  • F4 = full screen.
  • up key = move up.
  • left key = I am 100% sure you know what this does.
  • down key = Do I even need to explain?
  • rig...Never mind, YOU'VE GOT TO KNOW THIS ONE.

Finally, type down in the comments below  " I am AWESOME!" if you got more than 650 points.Please enjoy and if you are generous, donate at LEAST 10  cents.                     Good bye, and have a good time playing!

My website : https://arvinddharmadwiadm.wixsite.com/arreyvan-productions
